subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Carl Pettersson shot a four-under-par 66 and held a two-stroke lead at the Wyndham Championship in Greensboro, N.C. Scott McCarron was second after holing a 45-yard sand shot on No. 18 for a 64.
snippet: Carl Pettersson shot a four-under-par 66 and held a two-stroke lead at the Wyndham Championship in Greensboro, N.C. Scott McCarron was second after holing a 45-yard sand shot on No. 18 for a 64.
